<center>
Before you say "Why don't I wait for the BF promos?" - Our Budget Hosting was purposely re-invented to offer the lowest possible price long-term which means that promotional codes won't apply to this specific range. There will be promo codes for Shared, Reseller, Email and Domains and maybe a few bonus packages. What would you like to see?

---
SmallWeb's got it all. We offer DirectAdmin based services in 8 locations around the world including Amsterdam, Germany, Luxembourg, London, Los Angeles, Melbourne, New York and Singapore.

We recently changed back to having location-based packages to bring back automatic provisioning, service upgrades and to improve customer communication.
